category: news
title: "AI-startup Pipio Develops Video-Making Platform That Generates Digital Actors and Voice Over"
excerpt: "Pipio, a video-making platform for those looking to scale their video production process, is giving users the ability to create and add AI-generated, digital actors and voices to their videos. The company is set to launch a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo soon and is in search of early backers to help fund the development of additional actors and voices for the platform."
